posts.message: IE9 RC is available for download! I'm scared :(
posts.caption: techspot.com
posts.description: Microsoft has released Internet Explorer 9 Release Candidate. You can download version 9.0.8080.16412 now for: Windows Vista 32-bit and Windows Server 2008 32-bit, Windows Vista 64-bit and Windows Server 2008 64-bit, Windows 7 32-bit, and Windows 7 64-bit and Windows Server 2008 R2 64-bit.

posts.message: Professional PHP Web Development Course in Cairo
posts.caption: facebook.com

posts.message:
Advanced PHP web Development course.
-----------------------------
Pre-requests: web background and passing personal interview.
Starting time: TBD according to the 
Location:3/4 Anwer El-Moffty Street, Nasr City, Cairo.
Schedule: 2 sessions per week, 4 hours each for 2 months.
Duration : 64 hours.
Fees: 1250 LE.

Instructors: Ahmed Kamal, Ahemd Swilam, Ahmed Raslan.
Contact: Shady, Cell: 0111800897

Notes: 
1- Training and job opportunities are available for outstanding students. 
2- Please check the course outline.
3- Instructors cv are available upon request.
4- The personal Interview is a must.
